title: Professional Development & Leadership
description: Professional development materials, leadership resources, and coaching documents. These artifacts demonstrate commitment to professional growth, mentorship, and educational leadership.

projects.title: Coach Hunt's Lasting Messages
projects.description: Collection of motivational and instructional messages from Coach Hunt. These messages likely serve as a guide for students, emphasizing values, principles, and life lessons that extend beyond the classroom or gym. Demonstrates commitment to student character development and mentorship.
learningObjectives: Apply life lessons in academic and personal contexts

projects.title: Final Project
projects.description: Comprehensive final project presentation. This may represent a capstone project, comprehensive curriculum design, or major professional development initiative. The presentation demonstrates advanced instructional design skills and professional competence.
projects.note: This is a large presentation file. Consider creating a compressed version or PDF for web display while keeping the original for download.
